alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Yellowstone; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yellowstone County through 700 PM MDT... At 633 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Worden, or 21 miles northeast of Billings, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain with pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Worden and Ballantine. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding, especially in low-lying areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
